item.description:
JOIN US FOR 20s and 30s weekend, YOUNG PROFESSIONALS, save $50 with BostonMeetup this weekend (or save $25 any other weekend in 2009)
http://BostonMeetupGe... , click book now, choose July 31st weekend!
Any questions, call Greg @ 917-868-4268
You Can Do It All...Or Nothing At All.
From mountains and a sparkling lake to tennis courts and softball fields, Club Getaway is a 300-acre playground with every game and adventure under the sun. We've recruited top professional athletes and instructors to teach you everything from biking, tennis and kayaking to yoga, wine tasting and dance.
How you spend your weekend is completely up to you. You can pack every minute with sports and adventure, sleep late and lounge by the lake all day, or mix things up with a little bit of everything. Just be sure to save enough energy for some evening playtime, too
As the only facility of its kind on the East coast, the club is leading the way in sports, adventure, fitness and feeling-good vacations. The bottom line at Getaway is that everyone has a good time.
- Post
http://BostonMeetupGe... , click book now on the right,, Invite friends to join us for this amazing weekend!

Meet us friday night in Kent, CT, call Greg@ 917-868-4268 , don't miss this fun weekend of relaxing, partying, meeting new friends and adventure :)

This event is 21+ , Valid ID Required as there is drinking :) , so majority of us will be between 21-39
item.how_to_find_us: call & text Greg @ 917-868-4268 Friday Night for your free drink book (after typing or mentioning Fun Meetup when booking) , meet us at the welcome party friday night at the boathouse

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org

item.name: JOIN US FOR 20s and 30s weekend, YOUNG PROFESSIONALS,save $50 with BostonMeetup
